english.segment1: When clouds veil sun. And disaster comes. Oh, my soul. Oh, my soul. When waters rise. And hope takes flight. Oh, my soul. Oh, my soul. Oh, my soul
english.segment2: Ever faithful. Ever true. You I know. You never let go. You never let go. You never let go. You never let go
english.segment3: When clouds brought rain. And disaster came. Oh, my soul. Oh, my soul. When waters rose. And hope had flown. Oh, my soul. Oh, my soul. Oh, my soul
english.segment4: Oh, my soul. Overflows. Oh, what love, oh, what love. Oh, my soul. Fills hope. Perfect love that never lets go
english.segment5: Oh, what love, oh what love. Oh, what love, oh what love. In joy and pain. In sun and rain. YouÂ’re the same. Oh, You never let go
